mapper.select: SELECT VOUCHER_NO AS voucherNo, MEMBERP_NO AS memberNo, VOUCHER_NAME AS voucherName, VOUCHER_PRICE AS voucherPrice, BOUGHT_DATE AS boughtDate, END_DATE AS endDate, REFUND_YN AS refundYN FROM( SELECT Row_NUMBER() OVER (order by VOUCHER_NO DESC) AS Row_Num, PARENTS_VOUCHER.* FROM PARENTS_VOUCHER WHERE MEMBERP_NO = #{memberNo} ) WHERE Row_Num BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}
